# mass-image



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                    | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `overlay`          | `overlay` | If true, an overlay will darken the image.  Defaults to false. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `shape`            | `shape`   | Specifies the shape of the image.  Defaults to 'square'.       | `string`  | `'square'`  |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`     | Image source, can be a URL or a local image.                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
